Token.Abstract: Configures the file name for the .sqlite saved in the NSCachesDirectory. Tells CYCoreData the name of the *.xcdatamodeld to use and what bundle to search for it in

Parameter.Name: dataBaseFileName
Parameter.Abstract: NSString of the database file name that will get saved in the cache directory

Parameter.Name: bundleName
Parameter.Abstract: NSString of the bundle name that contains the modelfile

Parameter.Name: withModelFileName
Parameter.Abstract: NSString of the .xcdatamodeld in the bundle

Token.Abstract: Configures the file name for the .sqlite saved in the NSCachesDirectory. Tells CYCoreData the name of the *.xcdatamodeld to use and assumes it is located in the main bundle

Parameter.Name: dataBaseFileName
Parameter.Abstract: NSString of the database file name that will get saved in the cache directory

Parameter.Name: withModelFileName
Parameter.Abstract: NSString of the .xcdatamodeld in the bundle

Token.Abstract: Sets the keys for and type of unique indexer for NSManagedObjects. This key is used to fetch unique NSEntity in the database.

Parameter.Name: uniquePropertyKey
Parameter.Abstract: NSString for the unique property key if the NSManagedObject; example @"uid"

Parameter.Name: uniqueObjectValueType
Parameter.Abstract: UniqueObjectValueType type of value the uniquePropertyKey is

Parameter.Name: jsonSearchPropertyKey
Parameter.Abstract: NSString the key the unique property will have on a JSON of for that object

Parameter.Name: `UniqueIdentiferStruct`
Parameter.Abstract: Predefined struct of the values passesd to configureModelUniqueIdentifier:ofDataType:withJSONSearchString:

Token.Abstract: If set to YES, CYCoreData uses an NSInMemoryStoreType and does not write data to sqlite file via NSSQLiteStoreType.
Empties database of all entities, destroys NSManagedObject model and NSPersistantStoreCoordinator.

Returns NSManagedObjectContext of [CYCoreData liason].readContext private property. The concurrencyType is NSMainQueueConcurrencyType which means all fetched entities will be on the main runloop and suitable for view display.

Returns a brand NSManagedObjectContext of spawned off of the [CYCoreData readContext]. To update the database, fetch the NSEntityDescriptions from this context, create or modify as you see fit. When finished, immediately call either [temporaryWriteContext saveSynchronously] or [temporaryWriteContext saveAsynchronously]. This ensures that the changes will be pushed up to the [CYCoreData readContext], then written to disk.
Calls a sychronous(performBlockAndWait) action to the top NSManagedObjectContext to write the changes to disk.
Calls a Asychronous(performBlock) action to the top NSManagedObjectContext to write the changes to disk.
For topLevelContext performBlockAndWait pass YES. For topLevelContext performBlock pass NO.

Parameter.Name: andWait
Parameter.Abstract: BOOL for identify call to topLevelContext performBlock or performBlockAndWait
